title: Electric Bike
feature: This 29-inch bike includes front and rear V-brakes for enhanced stopping power. It also has an integrated flush-mounted battery and a rear hub brushless motor. The battery charges in around 4 hours and lasts for about 20 miles

title: Fitness Incline Treadmill
feature: Powered by a 1.5-peak horsepower motor, this indoor treadmill can achieve speeds between 1 km/h to 12 km/h. Made for walking and running.

title: Inflatable Boat
feature: Portable and lightweight, can fold into small size, easy to carry and storage. Made of PVC material, and durable, keep a long service life.

title: Billiard Pool Table
feature: Designed with professional K66 rubber bumpers that provide a consistent bounce and predictable shot, along with a smooth felt game table surface and parlor-style drop pockets.

title: Cabin Tent
feature: This tent has you protected with the 1,200 mm water resistant coating & taped seams. During beautiful summer days unzip the 8 mesh windows for added air circulation.
